call is:

  deails.mPattern.match(location + " : " + msg)

this is called by several threads concurrently

creator: o_sukhodolsky@yahoo.com
text: I'm not sure if RE is thread-safe, but anyway it would be great to have a test.

RE is not thread safe, which is, in fact, is documented here:
  http://jakarta.apache.org/regexp/apidocs/org/apache/regexp/RE.html

(last paragraph)
creator: vgritsenko@apache.org
